name: Chat App
description: Minimal real-time chatting app created using Flutter and Firebase. This is my first Flutter project.

name: Video Rental System
description: A full-stack web application for renting/buying movies, created using MERN stack, with JWT authentication, payment gateway integration and a movie recommendation system.

name: URL Shortener
description: Custom domain URL shortener, created using Node & Express with database on MongoDB, and hosted on Vercel.

name: HangMan
description: A word guessing game with a feature to use hint, using APIs to get random nouns and their definitions. This is my first React project.

name: To-Do List
description: A simple to-do list with add, edit and delete functionalities, using localStorage API to save list items. This is my first javascript project.

name: HangMan
description: This is my (well, my 12th grade version's) take on the famous guessing game. This Python project uses Tkinter and Pillow modules.
